articles.title: Announcing Messenger Series
articles.body_html:
Designs that send a message. A word in Courier New font to not distract from the simplicity of it all.

Courier (noun) -

  • a company that transports commercial packages and documents
  • a messenger for an underground or espionage organization.

Your pick.

alexbrady maiden series, inspired by themes from A Course in Miracles.
(Get A Course in Miracles)

Click to view in store now.

¬†

believe in miracles

Either they're real or they're not, and chances are you have no idea which it is.

Miracle principle #6:
Miracles are natural. When they do not occur something has gone wrong.

Might as well believe

¬†

¬†

very holy

hey if it's true it's true


My mind is part of God's.
I am very holy.
- us via jesus

you can believe it or not. if you like the idea, keep this¬†design around as a reminder. wear it to flex on your equally holy neighbors who don't own this hat. üòÇ

actually, you know what, get them an a.b hat. they could probably use one. üß¢

¬†

¬†

child of God

if there is a creator of the universe (soft if), by definition all this within the universe is its child. Substitute "God" for creator and this hat for the universe and you'll see why this is the most appropriate hat one could wear. Probably most appropriate hat ever, it's that appropriate.

Share your heritage with the world.

You are a child of God, a priceless part of His Kingdom, which He created as part of Him. Nothing else exists and only this is real. You have chosen a sleep in which you have had bad dreams, but the sleep is not real and God calls you to awake.
- Jesus, ACIM

¬†

¬†

who walks with me?

let's ask today. let's ask 1000 times.


"Who walks with me?" This question should be asked a thousand times a day, till certainty has ended doubting and established peace. Today let doubting cease. God speaks for you in answering your question with these words:
I walk with God in perfect holiness.
- jesus

let's remember the answer, too!

¬†

¬†

forgiveness opportunity

i apologize and i don't even know what i did or am about to do. will you ever forgive me? or, you know, die mad, lol üòâ

this is also a casual reminder for the me/you/us/alexbrady to approach every situation prepared to be truly helpful

Forgiveness is my function as the light of the world.
- alex brady, also jesus, probably you

¬†

¬†

light of the world

first a shout out to JC himself:
When Jesus spoke again to the people, he said, ‚ÄúI am the light of the world. Whoever follows me will never walk in darkness, but will have the light of life.‚Äù
- jesus


secondly a shout out to you:
Your function here is to be the light of the world, a function given you by God. It is only the arrogance of the ego that leads you to question this, and only the fear of the ego that induces you to regard yourself as unworthy of the task assigned to you by God Himself. The world's salvation awaits your forgiveness, because through it does the Son of God escape from all illusions, and thus from all temptation. The Son of God is you.
- jesus


can you wear it? be prepared to do forgiveness.

God is real

The solution to every problem you‚Äôll ever have.


‚ÄúGod is real.‚Äù


‚ÄòNuff said

miracles: seen

Miracles are seen in light. Understanding is light.
- jesus
